general_advisory: Apply well decomposed Farm Yard Manure/vermicompost during last ploughing in the field. Before raising any crop, go for soil testing. Apply balanced fertilizers as per soil test recommendations. Repair goat house before winter season.

advisory: Continue harvesting kharif paddy and process different varieties separately.
Do not burn residue in fields. Mix it with soil.
Address rodent/rats problem by using Aluminium Phosphide 6% tablet.
Follow recommended pest management for prevailing pests.
Apply Oxyflourfen 23.5% EC for weed management.
Apply Oxadiargyl 6% EC for pre-emergence weed management.
Spray bio insecticide or chemical insecticide to control pests.
Spray bio insecticide or chemical insecticide to control pests.
Spray bio insecticide or chemical insecticide to control pests.
Spray Buprofezin 15% + Acephate 35% WP to control aphids.
Spray neem based pesticide for fruit borer control.
Provide sufficient green grass. Lactating animals should have concentrate mix.
Repair goat house before winter season.
Provide heat to reduce mortality rate, especially for chicks. Maintain clean poultry house.
